Description:
The luxurious Efendi Hotel features a beautiful terrace with panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea. It is located in the historic centre of Acre and built on the remains of two connecting ancient buildings.

Only a 10-minute walk from the beach, this hotel is surrounded by picturesque alleys and is 100 metres from the promenade. The Jezzar Pasha Mosque is 200 metres away.

The rooms, each of it with its own unique design, are equipped with a TV, air conditioning, comfortable large beds, mini fridge, Nespresso machine, a safe, Wi Fi and more. In addition, the hotel has a large roof terrace with a panoramic view over the Mediterranean Sea, from Haifa to Rosh Hanikra.

Breakfast takes place in a dining hall around a knights table which is dated back to the early Ottomans Empire.

A relaxing session in the Turkish bath or in the massage rooms is not to be missed.

The Efendi Hotel has a 900-year-old wine cellar where guests can enjoy a special collection of local Israeli wines. Description:
Set on Bat Yams promenade, Hotel Suites is just 1-minute walk from the free public beach. It offers free Wi-Fi access and suites with a fridge and kettle.

Hotel Suites Bat Yam is surrounded by shops and restaurants. Bat Yam shopping mall is 15 minutes away on foot, while Tel Aviv centre is a 15-minute drive away. Free parking is provided and a bus stop is right outside.

The suites have tiled floors and neutral colour schemes. They feature a flat-screen TV with DVD player and a private bathroom with a shower or hydromassage bath. Breakfast is served each morning.
